updates.title: Hands-on with Bee, Amazon’s latest AI wearable
updates.description: We tried Amazon's new AI wearable Bee. It's not for pro users yet, but more features are expected this year.

updates.title: Just our type: The story of creating Figma Sans
updates.description: As Figma expands to include tools for all product builders, our community has evolved—and so has our brand. We’ve overhauled our entire visual identity from color palette to illustration style, and even commissioned a new typeface.

updates.title: Apple launches ‘Creator Studio’ bundle of apps for $12.99 per month
updates.description: The bundle includes access to Final Cut Pro, Logic Pro, and Pixelmator Pro on Mac and iPad, as well as Motion, Compressor, and MainStage on Mac.

updates.title: ElevenLabs CEO says the voice AI startup crossed $330 million ARR last year
updates.description: The company said it took only five months to go from $200 million to $330 million in annual recurring revenue.
